name: Billionaire Capitalist Boss
description:
It is ideal time for you to become Billionaire. Buy and Sell a variety of businesses to earn money and fulfil your dream to be Rich. Expand your empire with patience and strategy.

In this simulator you can buy a wide range of businesses - from pizza delivery to aerospace headquarters. Every business gives you varied profit. Buy more businesses when you have the capital or sell existing low earning businesses to buy more high earning ones. Do you have the ability to become a Billionaire?

More business you buy, more profit per minute you have...

This simple yet fun business clicker simulator is here to entertain you in its own crazy way!
If you wanna taste virtual businessman life then try this game, its fun and risk-free. No real time investment, just tap tap tap and become a Business TYCOON!!!

Can you reach net worth of 1 Billion?

Build your business in this Billionaire Capitalist Boss simulator and have some unique fun!!!
Compete with all the levels and become the best! Become a Billionaire Capitalist BOSS!

- 20 Levels
- 20 Type of Businesses
- Net Worth Calculator
- Simple Gameplay

Fun for everyone !!!
